about_the_game:
Digipunks 2069

Digitopia was one of the largest cities. In 2069, its population was in the millions. Its skyline is more impressive than that of other large cities; its metropolis was spread over such vast plains that skyscrapers and apartment buildings could be seen for miles. It was a city full of flying cars, fog, and stubborn digipunks. Its people are such a vivid mixture of races, languages, and colors that they seemed to shine in the lights of the city. The streets were teeming with people on their way to work. As clusters of people walked by, their pace would slow, their stride would lengthen and their eyes would widen, following the shadows cast by the bots.

Life outside the walls of Digitopia was much more brutal, as many struggled to survive. The people of the Wastelands were desperate for access to the advanced augmentation systems, but the high-tech pieces of equipment could only be obtained by the wealthiest of the population. The city members attempted to reign in their rebellious nature and ease their pain by constructing a plan. This was geared towards controlling those who resisted their power and the company. An essential part of this plan was they supplied basic foodstuffs to the people. The bots kept a close eye on these people with a sentry system, recording all data relating to them. Some did not have the technological strength to fight against them, but they still had courage. The company was not interested in the issue of the safety of the streets, which are the living space of the public. These people became the main resisters against the system, their clothes in tatters and feet bare on the bumpy road of life.

The powerful and wealthy company was working on a new technology called diginetic fluxducers, which were robotic parts that could connect with the humans' systems to give people superhuman strength and intelligence. But before the public event, they needed to test it on many people.

This is how the battle between the company and the digipunks began.

The ones and zeros, bits and bytes that formed the lifeblood of Digitopia now seemed completely worthless, it was a playground for their minds and was spreading fast.

They returned to the wastelands, now dominated by bots, with a new purpose, to protect their people from the company.

Here are some of the features and content You can expect from this challenging game . . .

Single Player OR Multiplayer {PvP OR CO-OP}

Choose from several different player characters

3rd person / 1st Person views

Go on Quests given to You by NPCs ALL over the City

Collect Sparks to Reach Your Goal

Drive Hover-Cars

Fight evil bots

Fun RPG style Gameplay for a Single Player OR Play with Your Friends via Steam Online Sub-System

Fight ShooterBots and Zombiebots across the vast game map

You can also try the Following Challenges . . .

"Easter Egg" Challenge - How many other Archor Games Logos Appear in the Game ?

"Speed Run" Challenge - What is the Fastest Time You can complete the game ?

"Scenic" Pictures Challenge - Take Screenshots of the Beautiful City and share them on Social Media with Your Friends.

"Walkthrough" Challenge - Post a video of a Complete 'Walkthrough' of the entire Game.

Walk Don't Run Challenge - Only Walk for the Entire Game.

"Steamy Streamer" Challenge - Get ALL of the Archor Games products available on Steam and Stream ALL of them Beginning to End.

... and more!

name: Digipunks 2069
short_description: Digipunks 2069 - You and Your friends must battle the company and evil bots for control of Digitopia. (Single Player OR Multiplayer {PvP OR CO-OP})
